desc: スパーク時、確率でＢＢゲージを少し増加

dictionary.lore: A jewel named after a region of Ishgria. Since this region was once home to many demons with the power of dragons, the disciples of the gods faced fierce battles when they invaded. In these battles, the demons went mad with rage and began to create sinister vortexes from the jewels they wore. Wrapped in these vortexes, the demons' attacks grew in force as they gained power, and it is said that many of the disciples of the gods were slain.

name: 魔封珠『ファル・ナーガ』
